competitors.name: CrowdStrike
competitors.notes: Primary competitor, leader in cloud-native endpoint protection

competitors.name: Carbon Black
competitors.notes: Acquired by VMware in 2019, enterprise endpoint security

competitors.name: Cylance
competitors.notes: AI-based endpoint protection, acquired by BlackBerry in 2018

context: In 2020, SentinelOne competed in the growing endpoint detection and response (EDR) market. CrowdStrike was the primary cloud-native competitor. VMware's 2019 acquisition of Carbon Black and BlackBerry's acquisition of Cylance showed market consolidation. The pandemic accelerated endpoint security demand as remote work expanded attack surfaces. SentinelOne was private, preparing for its June 2021 IPO at $8.9B valuation.
